thread.title: 20 Mouth- Watering Dishes From Delhi That Will Make You So Hungry
thread.title_full: 20 Mouth- Watering Dishes From Delhi That Will Make You So Hungry

title: 20 Mouth- Watering Dishes From Delhi That Will Make You So Hungry
text:
facebook 440 SHARES Delhi is known for two things, Dilliwale (Delhi’s people) and Dilli ka khaana (Delhi’s food). Food is one thing that keeps the people of Delhi motivated, with all its variety and flavour! With such a rich diversity in the cuisines available, and a million good places to eat at, it becomes a really tough task to choose where to go next! But to avoid all this stress, you can check out Dineout's Great Indian Restaurant Festival , India's first ever restaurant festival featuring 1000 restaurants, to figure out all the best, and most delicious deals in Delhi! Here are just some of the many treats you can get for yourself. 1. Dry Chilly Paneer, The Reset 2. Ricotta Cheese Cake, Cafe Amaretto 3. Dawat e Biryani, Tourist Janpath 4. Nachos- Fajita Chicken, Jon’s Head Grill 5. Chicken Wings, Tap House Cafe 6. Crystal Chicken Dimsums, Big Wong 7. Spanish Prawns Pil Pil, Fres Co 8. Jadavpoore Puchka Chaat, Khaaja Chowk 
9.Murgh Tikka Makhani, Cafe None Such 10. Galouti Kebab, Dhaba by Claridges 11. Chuza Murgh, Aanch 13. Pao Bhaji, Yello Brick Road- Vivanta 14. Penne Chicken Makhani, Less Than Perfect 15. Vegetariana Pizza, 56 Ristorante Italiano 16. Bhut Jolokia Prawn Stir Fry, Fire- The Park 17. Malai Murgh Tikka, Cafe Southall 18. Veg Patty Burger, Raasta 19. Ney Kratium Phrik Pu, Thai high 20. Warm Chocolate Brownie, Blooms- Eros Hotel
